description: Learn how to make this simple salsa with loads of flavour. Pop this punchy pico de gallo on your tacos, toss it in a burrito or serve as a dip with tortilla chips.
keywords: Dip & spread,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Low kilojoule,Dairy free,Pescatarian,Low salt,Egg free,Low sugar,Salsa,Halal,Oct 2021,Vegetarian,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegan,Tomato,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Pico De Gallo Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 bunch coriander, leaves picked, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Combine onion, lime juice and jalapeno in a bowl. Set aside for 5 minutes. Add tomato and coriander to onion mixture and stir to combine. Stand for 15 minutes, then serve.
